article_title: The family-friendly issue: Five ways to explore Colorado with kids – The Denver Post
article_text: Grace First, 5, of Baltimore approaches the end of the new 200-foot Kid's Zipline at Adventure Ridge at the top of the Eagle Bahn Gondola in Vail. The kid-friendly zipline is the newest edition to Adventure Ridge, which includes many other activities.<!--IPTC: VAIL, CO. - JULY 05: Grace First, 5, from Baltimore Maryland, closes her eyes when she approaches the automatic brake area at the end of the new 200ft. Kid's Zipline at Adventure Ridge at the top of the Eagle Bahn Gondola at the Vail Saturday afternoon, July 05, 2014. The kid-friendly zipline is the newest edition to Adventure Ridge which includes a much larger, 1,200-ft, zipline, multiple rope courses, scenic tours in an open-air vehicle, climbing walls, trampolines, hiking and biking tours and many other activities. (Photo By Andy Cross / The Denver Post) -->

article_summary:
Kid's Zipline at Adventure Ridge at the top of the Eagle Bahn Gondola at the Vail Saturday afternoon, July 05, 2014.
Grace First, 5, of Baltimore approaches the end of the new 200-foot Kid's Zipline at Adventure Ridge at the top of the Eagle Bahn Gondola in Vail.
(Photo By Andy Cross / The Denver Post) -->
The kid-friendly zipline is the newest edition to Adventure Ridge which includes a much larger, 1,200-ft, zipline, multiple rope courses, scenic tours in an open-air vehicle, climbing walls, trampolines, hiking and biking tours and many other activities.
